ygData.subject: Postselector generalization
ygData.msgSnippet: Heritrix, What do people think of changing the Postselector to use generic error flags that would be set by the Fetch chain?  This way, it wouldn t be

Heritrix,

What do people think of changing the Postselector to use generic error
flags that would be set by the Fetch chain?  This way, it wouldn't be
specifically dependent on HTTP status codes per se.

John
